## R packages 📦

<br>


```{r}
#| eval: false
#| include: true
#| echo: true
library(usethis) # Load usethis
use_github_action("check-standard") # run check
use_github_action("pkgdown") # build pkgdown site
```

<br>

See other examples in: [github.com/r-lib/actions/](https://github.com/r-lib/actions/tree/v2/examples)
